attributes.action: Make littering from a moving vehicle a criminal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
owners of vehicles should be prosecuted for throwing items from a moving vehicle onto the highway.
mainly because items such as tin (drink) cans can bounce up and cause damage to other road users,and vehicles and in some cases cause a road trafic accident,and possible personal injury.
At the moment the police have no power to prosecute,and can only pass on advise to the offender.
